content: **knitted jacket in 1 strand drops fabel and 2 strands drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down with raglan v-neck and bands sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-555 yarn group a + a + a or d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-200-250-250-300-300 g colour 602 silver fox and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-125-125-150-150 g colour 01 off white 100-100-125-125-150-150 g colour 56 marzipan **buttons** drops buttons no 614 4 items in all sizes **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 17 row in height with stocking stitch and 3 strands on needle size 6 = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
